fullDescription.intro: This layer applies global max pooling in two dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Global Max Pooling 2D Layer.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (height, width, channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, height, width)

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Global Max Pooling 2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Global Max Pooling 2D layer.
